about_the_game:
RPG Locations Music Pack by Eric Francis is an RPG Maker official DLC collection of music, designed with RPG Maker games in mind. Each track in this collection is themed for the specific locations that are essential to every RPG, including towns, overworlds, battles, bosses, forests, caves, etc.

■ The tracks are named for the location that Eric Francis imagined when creating the song, however how you use them is up to you!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Contents- 50 tracks/ m4a, ogg files】
• 2 Battles
• 1 Boat
• 5 Bosses
• 4 Caves
• 1 Desert
• 3 Forest
• 1 Graveyard
• 1 House
• 1 Ice Cave
• 2 Mountains
• 2 Overworlds
• 2 Ruined Towns
• 2 Shrines
• 2 Snow Fields
• 2 Title Screen Themes
• 5 Towns
• 2 Water Caves
• Various Scene/Mood Themes

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
